title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

  • “Scratchwork” can be ignored; the use of a variable other than x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4baaaa@39F9@ is acceptable.

  • Domain restrictions are not required to be included and are not scored.

  • Where applicable, answers that have not been evaluated according to bullets 2 and 3 in the Directions do not earn the point.

  • A logarithmic expression that is missing one or both parentheses around the full argument of the logarithm is still eligible to earn the point.

  • If a response is presented as a complex fraction, the complex fraction must be unambiguous in structure. Parentheses must be used correctly, and/or the fraction bars must be clearly and correctly proportioned.
descriptions:
The student response includes none of these criteria.

  • Expression for j (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGQbGaaGjcVlaacIcacaWG4bGaaiykaaaa@3DD2@ with or without supporting work, provided no incorrect work is included

  • Expression for k (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGRbGaaGjcVlaacIcacaWG4bGaaiykaaaa@3DD3@ with supporting work. NOTE: k (x)= 1 sin x =csc x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A72@ , is acceptable with supporting work.

  • Two components. One of the following:

    • Expression in (i) is reported as −ln( 5 (x+2) x 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4409@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as −ln( 5 x 4 +2 x 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43A5@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported using logarithm base 10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaGimaaaa@3A71@ and has the correct argument OR presents − log 10  ( 5 ( x+2 ) x 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4861@ or − log 10  ( 5 x 4 +2 x 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47CD@ .

      AND One of the following:

    • Correct expression in (ii) without supporting work

    • Expression in (ii) is reported as sin 2  x+ cos 2  x sin x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BFC@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (ii) includes a correct application of a Pythagorean identity with no incorrect work.

The student response includes one of these criteria.

  • Expression for j (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGQbGaaGjcVlaacIcacaWG4bGaaiykaaaa@3DD2@ with or without supporting work, provided no incorrect work is included

  • Expression for k (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGRbGaaGjcVlaacIcacaWG4bGaaiykaaaa@3DD3@ with supporting work. NOTE: k (x)= 1 sin x =csc x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A72@ , is acceptable with supporting work.

  • Two components. One of the following:

    • Expression in (i) is reported as −ln( 5 (x+2) x 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4409@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as −ln( 5 x 4 +2 x 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43A5@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported using logarithm base 10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaGimaaaa@3A71@ and has the correct argument OR presents − log 10  ( 5 ( x+2 ) x 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4861@ or − log 10  ( 5 x 4 +2 x 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47CD@ .

      AND One of the following:

    • Correct expression in (ii) without supporting work

    • Expression in (ii) is reported as sin 2  x+ cos 2  x sin x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BFC@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (ii) includes a correct application of a Pythagorean identity with no incorrect work.

The student response includes both of these criteria.
